name: Parkland
description:
Story:
Some valleys on Earth have been set as target destinations for creatures teleportation from other dimensions through spacebreak of the universe. But humans did not know it, constructed the roads which became dangerous for these creatures.
That is why they invited you to work as a manager of Parkland to search, collect and move these animals to the safe zone.

Content:
12 of day times
12 vegetations
16 terrains
2304 variations

Note:
When higher missions you earn means of transport. Firstly after all creatures were saved, later in the course of the mission and finally in the half of the mission. Lots of luck from the authors!
